trans-unit.source: Provides a means of getting or setting the value of the associated properties of the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> element.
trans-unit.target: Consente di ottenere o impostare il valore delle proprietà associate dell'istanza dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà associata <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AccessKey" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà associata <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AccessKey" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> attached property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la proprietà associata <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey" /> proprietà associata per l'oggetto specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il tasto di scelta rapida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AccessKey" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AccessKey" /> proprietà associata per l'oggetto specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Tasto di scelta per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId" /> proprietà associata per l'oggetto specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Identificatore [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property isn't set, this method returns the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> proprietà non è impostata, questo metodo restituisce il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText" /> proprietà associata per l'oggetto specificato <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the help text for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il testo della Guida per l'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The string that is returned generally is the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: La stringa restituita corrisponde in genere al testo fornito nella descrizione comando per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to check.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.IsColumnHeader" /> attached property for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />.
